description: Filming these two guys was a lot of fun. Rowan and Sean both know how to have a good time on set and both really know how to fuck. “Who’s bottoming today Sean?” He giggled like he does when he gets nervous. “I am! However, I think it’s going to be interesting cause I usually am the dominant one but Rowan thinks he’s going to be.” “So are we going to see you be a power bottom?” I asked. “Damn fucking right. Kid better fuck my ass good!” He laughed. Sean and Rowan went at it right away and Rowan did a great job at pounding out Sean. The only thing was it seems Sean couldn’t get enough. “Maybe I’ll have to find two dicks at once for you next time!” “Whoa, whoa, whoa….baby steps!”
title: Sean & Rowan: Bareback
